data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Møre og Romsdal who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Møre og Romsdal, Norway
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Møre og Romsdal, Norway, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Møre og Romsdal, Norway the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 21,296 believers in Møre og Romsdal against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Kurd, Kurmanji people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, guide the church in Møre og Romsdal, Norway to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Møre og Romsdal, Norway.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Møre og Romsdal to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: Møre og Romsdal
location.people_groups_list: Dutch, Albanian, South Asian, general, Somali, Jew, Norwegian-speaking
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Dutch (5,500), Albanian (10,000), South Asian, general (27,000), Somali (39,000), Jew, Norwegian-speaking (1,300)
